sentences.sContent: The council must make economies to meet government spending targets.
sentences.sCn: 市政会必须采取节约措施以达到政府的开支指标。

sentences.sContent: Not insuring your belongings is a false economy (= it is cheaper but could have bad results ).
sentences.sCn: 不给个人财产投保实际上并不划算。

sentences.sContent: ...China in this period enjoyed a splendid era with overwhelmingly developed economy and commerce...
...the development of handicraft industry promoted the development of market economy and urbanization...
...fishing fish and crabs is rather important for the residents along the lake and makes great contribution to the economy of the surrounding areas...
...a diverse and vigorous economy attracted to the urban core has offered stable employment for residents...
...At a time when our economy is still recovering from the Great Recession...
...If the economy starts to shrink again...
...is why claims that we face huge structural problems have been multiplying: they offer a reason to do nothing about the mass unemployment that is crippling out economy and our society...
...we face a series of deadlines that require us to make major decisions about how to pay down our deficit —decisions that will have a huge impact on the economy and the middle class...
...Add a rapidly changing economy and an uncertain future to this 24/7 connectivity...
...is also the only advanced economy that does not guarantee workers paid vacation time...

phrases.pCn: 节约燃料；耗热率；燃料经济学
多种经营；多种经济，多样化经济

remMethod.val: “依靠农民” → 中国是农业大国， 经济发展离不开农民 → 经济

words.tran: 经济的，经济上的；经济学的
经济地；在经济上；节俭地
经济学；国家的经济状况
节约装置；节约者；经济家

trans.tranCn: 经济； 节约， 节省
trans.tranOther: something that you do in order to spend less money
